messages.content:
承知いたしました。`src/pages/Top.vue`の該当する`div`要素の横幅を80%に修正します。

- [ ] `src/pages/Top.vue`の`div`要素に`w-4/5`クラスを追加
- [ ] ビルドチェックの実行

現在、最初のタスクに対応中です。

thoughts.subject: Calculating the Tailwind CSS
thoughts.description: I'm working on adjusting the width of a `div` element using Tailwind CSS. The goal is to set it to 80%. Currently, the div has classes like `flex`, `flex-row`, and `overflow-x-auto`. I'm figuring out the precise Tailwind class I need to add to achieve the desired 80% width. I'm leaning towards using the `w-` utilities.

thoughts.subject: Refining Width Application
thoughts.description: I've determined that the `w-4/5` class is the correct Tailwind utility to set the `div`'s width to 80%. My plan is to directly modify the `src/pages/Top.vue` file. I will insert `w-4/5` into the class list of the target `div` element, and then I will conduct a build check to ensure the changes work as expected.

messages.content:
`src/pages/Top.vue`の変更が完了しました。
次に、ビルドチェックを実行します。

thoughts.subject: Verifying Build Configuration
thoughts.description: I've successfully added the `w-4/5` class to the `div` element in `src/pages/Top.vue`. Now, the focus shifts to ensuring the build process functions correctly. My next step is to execute the build check using the `npm run build` command, as per project documentation.

messages.content:
ビルドチェックが成功しました。
これで、ご依頼の作業は完了です。

thoughts.subject: Confirming User Completion
thoughts.description: I've confirmed that the build check was successful. It looks like the user's request has been fully satisfied. I'm ready to move on to the next task.
